section.header: What even are Guides? I've never heard of those.
section.body: Guides are all about showing others their aspects while also protecting them from the dangers of it.

section.header: It seems that I have rolled Guide. What should I do?
section.body: There are from two to twelve lands in your session - maybe even more - and your team is already claiming they've seen it all? They are liars. Grab them and drag to a hiking trip. It's fun!
